text: Fort Leavenworth is a United States Army installation in Leavenworth County, Kansas. It was built in 1827. It is the oldest active United States Army post west of Washington, D.C., and it is the oldest permanent settlement in Kansas. Fort Leavenworth has been historically known as the "Intellectual Center of the Army." It became a National Historic Landmark in 1960. and ==References== ==Other websites== * Freedom's Frontier * Frontier Army Museum * Fort Leavenworth Home Page * Munson Army Health Center * Guide for visitors to Fort Leavenworth * The Fort Leavenworth Lamp Online â€“ Fort Leavenworth's Newspaper * U.S. Army Combined Arms Center * U.S. Army Disciplinary Barracks, Fort Leavenworth, Kansas * TRADOC Schools * TRADOC Website * Fort Leavenworth History Collection Combined Arms Research Library Digital Library * USD 207 local unified school district * Fort Leavenworth has been extensively documented by the Historic American Buildings Survey.
